areas.title: Banking Fraud Detection
areas.description: Production fraud detection systems for major Indonesian financial institutions
highlights: Real-time transaction monitoring with ML models
Feature engineering for velocity-based fraud patterns
LSTM autoencoders for sequential fraud detection
Model explainability with SHAP and LIME
achievements: Maintained 99.9%+ SLA compliance for production fraud detection systems
Improved monitoring efficiency by 50% through automation

areas.title: Federated Learning Security
areas.description: Byzantine-resilient federated learning for secure cross-institution collaboration
highlights: SignGuard: 94.5% attack detection with ECDSA + Anomaly Detection + Reputation
Secure aggregation with Shamir's Secret Sharing
Privacy attacks: membership inference, gradient leakage, property inference
Byzantine-robust aggregation: Krum, Multi-Krum, FoolsGold
achievements: 21-project FedPhish portfolio with ZKP and HE (50K LOC, 461 tests)
SignGuard: Novel defense achieving 94.5% detection rate
Published research paper on FL security

areas.title: Production AI & LLMOps
areas.description: Enterprise-grade AI systems with RAG, LangGraph agents, and LLMOps pipelines
highlights: Multi-modal RAG systems for document intelligence
LangGraph agents for customer support and fraud triage
LLMOps evaluation frameworks with RAGAS metrics
Production deployment with Docker and Kubernetes
achievements: 10-project Enterprise AI portfolio (115K+ LOC, 32 test files)

areas.title: Steganography & Information Hiding
areas.description: Published research in steganographic methods using PVD, LSB, and modulo encoding
highlights: PVD + LSB + Modulo Encoding implementation
NIST SP 800-90A CTR_DRBG with AES-128
Channel optimization for reduced distortion
Testing across 131 images with 10 message sizes each
achievements: 1,310 embedding trials evaluated with PSNR, MSE, SSIM

areas.title: Malware Analysis & Detection
areas.description: Static analysis framework for banking trojan detection
highlights: PE file structure analysis
API call sequence extraction
YARA rule development and matching
ML-based malware classification
